# Preparativos
```{r carga-paquetes, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(sf)
library(DT)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
felinos <-
  st_read(
    "felinos.csv",
    options = c(
      "X_POSSIBLE_NAMES=decimalLongitude", # columna de longitud decimal
      "Y_POSSIBLE_NAMES=decimalLatitude"   # columna de latitud decimal
    ),
    quiet = TRUE
  )
```

# Tabla

```{r tabla, echo=FALSE}
felinos %>%
  select(species,
         eventDate,
         stateProvince,
         locality,
         decimalLongitude,
         decimalLatitude) %>%
  st_drop_geometry() %>%
  datatable(
    colnames = c(
      "Especie",
      "Fecha",
      "Provincia",
      "Localidad",
      "Longitud",
      "Latitud"
    ),
    options = list(
      pageLength = 10,
      language = list(url = '//cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/1.10.11/i18n/Spanish.json')
    )
  )
```
